_header: Regina celi letare / For Christ Thy Son so dear
Subjects: Virgin Mary, carols to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, ‘Regina celi letare’, a hymn — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line burden: ‘Regina celi letare / With God and man alsoo / Quem meruisti portare / Withowten peyn and woo’ (alternate Latin and English lines throughout)

CULEe112.First Lines:
Regina celi letareffor crist thy sonne so
                    dere…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Pro salute fideliumThat he may graunt us
                    blisse

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

         89 (1892): 167-338: 319-20.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 158; 1977, 140.
